<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Spider Gun](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1170)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 155 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _spider gun_ is a _+1 striking weapon_. It's a distinct type of martial firearm made from the fangs and spinneret of a Large spider. It deals 1d10 poison damage with a [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of 30 feet and [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254). On a critical hit, the venom clings to the target and they take [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to 1d4 + the number of weapon damage dice. A spider gun does not add critical specialization effects. The gun can be activated to fire webbing that hampers other creatures.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> Interact ([conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)) **Frequency** once per round;   **Effect** You fire a mass of webbing at a square within 30 feet. That square becomes covered in webbing for 1 minute. A square covered with the webbing from a _spider gun_ can be cleared by a single attack or effect that deals at least 5 slashing damage or 1 fire damage. A square has AC 5, and it automatically fails its saving throws. The first time each turn a creature in the webbing begins to use a move action or enters the webbing during a move action, it must attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check or Reflex save against DC 20. On a success, it moves normally through the webbing and clears away the webbing from any squares it enters this turn. On a failure, it treats squares of webbing as difficult terrain this turn, and on a critical failure, it's [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 round or until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (DC 20) or destroys the webbing.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials for the _spider gun_ must include the fangs and spinneret of a giant spider or other Large spider.
